title: Languages of Love

panel_structure.description: In the library of feelings where emotions are books, Evan teaching Architect to read human emotional nuance while Architect shows Evan geometric feeling-forms
They create together a new section—books that are part words, part patterns, a hybrid language only they can fully read

transformation_notes: The library of feelings becomes their classroom. They're not just learning each other's emotional languages but creating a third one—a pidgin of human and digital feeling that belongs only to them.
